channel.title: Tales from Your Mom's Basement : An Original Media For Gamers Production
channel.itunes:subtitle: Tales from Your Mom's Basement
channel.itunes:author: Director : Arazi
channel.itunes:summary: Tales from Your Mom's Basement is a half-hour radio play anthology series produced 100% LIVE every week. With a few "To Be continueds" aside, every episode is completely unique in story, characters, and genre, and every episode features an original script and a cast of professional actors and foley artists coming from our studio in North Hollywood. For traditional, classic style radio play entertainment, look no further than Tales from Your Mom's Basement.
channel.description: Tales from Your Mom's Basement is a half-hour radio play anthology series produced 100% LIVE every week. With a few "To Be continueds" aside, every episode is completely unique in story, characters, and genre, and every episode features an original script and a cast of professional actors and foley artists coming from our studio in North Hollywood. For traditional, classic style radio play entertainment, look no further than Tales from Your Mom's Basement.
